name: Maurits Fokkens
about_text:
Hello! I'm Maurits, a passionate software developer with a strong focus on creating elegant and user-friendly web applications.

With over 5 years of experience in full-stack development, I combine technical expertise with an eye for design to build digital solutions that truly make a difference.

I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer. Whether it's optimizing existing systems or building something completely new from scratch, I approach every project with enthusiasm and dedication.

In my free time, I enjoy experimenting with new technologies, contributing to open source projects, and sharing my knowledge with the developer community.
